content: Retirement CPF AMA 1M65 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Nov 2018How likely do you think CPF life payout age will be pushed back to an older age? Do you see this happening soon?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Good Day Every DayLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 30 Nov 2018I am not a fortune teller. Thus, I would not know whether CPF life payout age will be pushed back to an older age. However, what I am certain is that one should tap on CPF to grow his funds. 0 comments0

Loo Cheng Chuan, Founder at 1M65 MovementLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Nov 2018I do not pay much attention to the CPF LIFE scheme because I feel that it is grossly inadequate to fund my retirement lifestyle. Once you have obtained 1M65, you will discover that it will far outweigh whatever CPF LIFE is able to offer you. CPF LIFE exists because there are many out there who are unable to manage their retirement funding properly and CPF LIFE can function as a form of a safety net for this group of people.0 comments0
